abstrac: Graphic Designer. Photo Retoucher. Creative, Professional. From the mockup to the press.
bio:
I'm a graphic designer with strong photo retouching skills. I've been working for several years for design firms, ad agencies and printing companies doing design (Identity, Collateral, Brochures, Flyers, Magazines, Newsletters, etc.) and Photo Retouch (product retouch, fashion and beauty retouch, image cleanup, etc.).
With more than 15 years of experience, my strenght is my capacity to develop professional designs and to take them correctly to the press.

Communication.
You can contact me by email or chat. I'm always online and use to reply emails immediately. 


Guarantee Policy.
I work until you are 100% satisfied. That has been the goal I have followed here since 2003.


Payment Method.
Guru's SafePay Escrow. This will let us invoice, keep track of the transactions and will give you the ability to make the payment using a variety of methods, and release the payment once you're happy with the job.

abstrac: Solution Consultant, Problem Solver, Software Engineer, Team Leader
bio:
Passionate software engineer with a track record of delivering solution architecture, quality, extendable, scalable, and functional code. Enthusiastic about collaborating, mentoring, providing technical leadership, and building large-scale back-end systems & data warehouses that effectively and elegantly address business needs.

I love bringing innovation to any team or company to put them ahead of the curve.
One of my proudest projects to date is having written >90 % of the code for a statement-of-work (SOW) automation tool and analytics dashboard which rolled out in 2021Q1.

Have industrial and research experience in JavaScript, Java, C#, distributed system frameworks such as Apache Storm and Spark, SQL/PLSQL, NoSQL, Machine Learning, BI analytics, REST API and Microservices framework.

Lead and management experience over 3 years to connect business needs and transform them into successful and effective solutions throughout collaboration within technology, data, and information services. I deliver value by solving the challenges that arise from integrating technology into complex enterprise environments. I drive technical architecture programs from strategy through implementation by applying deep system analysis, iterative solutioning practices and TOGAF principles.

Outside of professional work, I'm a fan of Shopify and enjoy helping with building Shopify storefronts and developing apps for merchants.

If you have a vision in mind, no matter how crazy you think it is, feel free to reach out and I might be able to help you bring it to life!
$80/h * 40h/week (Able to start right away)

abstrac: Build Your Metaverse with us & an IT Development company
bio:
Wrexa was started with a dream to provide world-class online solutions to businesses around the world.Wrexa has proliferated globally and now has become a renowned name, primarily due to its powerhouse combination of qualified professionals, latest technologies and tenacious passion for what we do.
Tailored to meet global standards, our services are employed in a seamless work flow, with strict adherence to quality. We provide enterprise solutions that are within your budget, fall in line with your business needs and are delivered on time.

OUR EXPERTISE
Wrexa has a rich expertise in Game Development in Unity3D & Unreal ,Metaverse Development,AR/VR Games, Mobile Development, Web Development, E-commerce, Blockchain Development. We also specialize in On-Demand Mobile Application Development and the various sectors of Blockchain Development such as DApp, Cryptocurrency development, ICO development and Marketing, Smart Contract Development and Hyperledger development. 

Our passionate developers embrace new technologies to build applications and leverage them in order to deliver results that would be beneficial to our clients not only for the present but also in the days to come. Our strategies and ventures prove our skills and proficiency in providing top-notch results to gratify our clients. We render astute services and make every effort to spread a positive impact across the world.

OUR VALUES
We approach every client with a view of building long-term partnership. We focus constantly on meeting clients’ expectation and delivering solutions with absolute transparency. We hold honesty and integrity with high regard. We only promise what we can deliver and not add features that will just end up costing you more. We stick to no cookie cutter practices. Our approach is creative and innovative. With our world-class services, we deliver ethical, quality driven and cost-effective solutions.
HAVE A PROJECT?
We approach every client with a view of building long-term partners
We work throughout the week!!!

I am Certified System Administrator and I will support your staff or helpdesk with their Windows 10/11 computers, networking equipment, and software applications, and cloud platforms.

FIRST CLASS - Phone, chat, email, and remote desktop support is available for helpdesk technical support tasks, IT tickets, assistance, and to resolve any other issues.

abstrac: One Stop Web Development and Mobile App Development Solutions
bio:
Thank you for considering the company profile. 

We are highly organised, motivated, energetic and experienced technocrats who loves to work under pressure in fast-paced, time-sensitive environments. We are a bunch of professional and reliable programmers with 13+ years of experience and excellent skills in software development which includes but are not limited to following ones,

Web Application Development:
* PHP / .Net / Python / RoR / Java / NodeJs
* Mysql / Aurora / PostgreSql / MariaDB / SqlServer / Oracle / DynamoDB / MongoDB / Redis
* AngularJS / ReactJS / BackboneJS / Jquery / ExtJS
* Bootstrap / LESS / SASS / HTML5 / CSS3
* Laravel / Zend / Symphony / Yii / CodeIgniter / CakePHP / Phalcon / .Net MVC / Django
* Wordpress / Magento / Prestashop / Drupal / Sharepoint / DNN (DotNetNuke) / Django-cms
* vTiger / SugarCRM / SuiteCRM / ZOHO CRM / MS Dynamics

Mobile Application Development:
* iOS Native, Xcode / Swift 
* Android Native
* Hybrid App, Ionic / Phonegap / Framework 7
* React Native, IBM Worklight

Integrations: 
* QuickBooks / FreshBooks / Xero / Myob / Sage / Traverse Accounting System Integration
* Stripe / Authorize.net / Paypal / ACH / ComproPago / ChargeItPro / Quantum Payment Gateway Integration
* UPS / USPS / FedEX / ShipStation / Shippo / EliteExtra Shipping Integration
* InfusionSoft / GetResponse / Aweber / iContact / Sendy / Campaign Monitor / MailChimp / SendGrid / MailGun / Amazon SES Integration
* Trello / Jira / Redmine / Freshdesk / Zendesk Integration
* Facebook / Twitter / Google / Linkedin / Google Map / Bing Integration
* Amazon S3 / Rackspace CDN / CloudFlare / Sucuri / Google Drive / Dropbox Integration
* Elastic / Solr / Memcache / Varnish Implementation
* Pusher / Socket.io Implementation

Turnaround time: Guaranteed 1 Business Day

Availability: 24x7

Payment terms: NO UPFRONT PAYMENTS

We work On Mutual Agreements only through Guru Safepay only on milestone delivery or hourly payments as mutually agreed.

Communication channels:
Email, Direct Contact, Skype, Hangouts, Whatsapp, Slack etc.

We have developed great command over working with geographically distributed teams and we are well versed with:

* GIT (GitHub / GitLab / BitBucket) / SVN etc. version control systems (branching workflow).
* Jira / Basecamp / Redmine / Pivotal Tracker / Trello / Flow / Scrumdo or any other project management tools.
* Skype / Google Hangout / Slack or any other communication tools.
* Jenkins / Amazon CodeDeploy / Bamboo / Rsync etc. code deployment tools.
* Cpanel / WHM / AWS Management / Linux server management.

We as a company provide the following advantages:
* Refreshing and Hitech office environment for our resources to work efficiently.
* 24 Hrs Power backup for uninterrupted work.
* Multiple ISPs support for uninterrupted work.
* Dual screen system for all resources working from our office space.
* Direct communication with Developer/Manager over email/chat/call.
* 24/7 support for mission-critical cases.
* QA and Project Management resource at no additional cost.
* Multiple billing modes for clients to choose from based on their convenience.

We work until your project success. We are aware of challenges faced by clients during project execution and try extremely hard to overcome those challenges to make it really efficient, smooth and successful. To see us in action, allow us a chance and you won't regret your decision ever.
